column1: #Text=Aang says : " First you got to form the ball , then you got to get on quick . "
#Text=Air Nomad boy # 1 says : " Okay , here goes . "
#Text=Aang says : " You kind of have to balance on it like it 's a top . "
#Text=Air Nomad boy # 1 says : " Man , that 's hard . "
#Text=Air Nomad boy # 2 says : " Where 'd you learn that trick , Aang ? "
